title: **FINAL PRICE REDUCTION 8/10** FS: 5 T206s Cobb, Mathewson, Marquard, Crandall EPDG

posts.post_title: **FINAL PRICE REDUCTION 8/10** FS: 5 T206s Cobb, Mathewson, Marquard, Crandall EPDG
posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone,

I have the following 5 T206s for sale. All Prices include shipping:
SGC 40 Crandall (no cap) EPDG... $100.. Sold
SGC 55 Schlei (port) Pied 350-460... $50... Sold
SGC 35 Marquard (follow through) Old Mill... $80
SGC 40 Cobb (bat off) Polar Bear... $975
SGC 30 Mathewson (Port) Pied 150... $325... Sale Pending

For all pictures of the fronts and backs please click the link below:
[url]http://s251.photobucket.com/albums/gg309/blunder19/New%20Graded%20Cards/[/url]

Please note in the Album you will see a Lenox back, a Hindu, and a Broadleaf also... at this point... those 3 cards are for trade only.. I am looking for SL Hindu Backs and Seymour throwing rare backs.

best way to reach me is through email: [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url]

Jamie

been getting several emails about the Hindu SLers on my want list.. I am highly interested in a Shag hindu.

just thought I would put that out there.

Jamie
Jamie- interested in a trade for the lenox......
